lead_paragraph: ST. LIFER--Herbert W.,of Larchmont, NY, 85, died peacefully on February 4, 2016. Loving and beloved husband of Barbara (Sisholz) and adored father of Nancy and Elizabeth (Steven Ostrow). Fun loving uncle and cherished friend. He will be missed by all who knew him. Funeral Sunday, February 7, 2016, 11:30am, at Zion Memorial Chapel, 785 East Boston Post Rd, Mamaroneck, NY 10543 (www.zionchapel.com). The family will be receiving at his home Saturday evening from 7:30-9:00pm and Sunday afternoon following the funeral service until 4:00pm. Charitable contributions to Alzheimer's Disease Research or the American Lung Foundation would be greatly appreciated. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ST. LIFER, HERBERT W.
